named-query.name: findAllUserProfiles
named-query.query: select distinct u from UserProfileEntity u order by u.loginName

named-query.name: findUserProfileByLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct u from UserProfileEntity u where u.loginName = :loginName

named-query.name: findGroupByName
named-query.query: select distinct g from UserGroupEntity g where g.name = :groupName

named-query.name: findGroupSelf
named-query.query: select distinct g from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName and g.name is null

named-query.name: findGroupsByLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct g from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName

named-query.name: findAllGroupMembers
named-query.query: select distinct gm, u from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join fetch gm.user u where g.name = :groupName order by u.loginName

named-query.name: findGroupMemberWithGroupAndProfileId
named-query.query: select distinct gm from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.id = :profileId and g.name = :groupName

named-query.name: findGroupMemberWithGroupAndLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct gm from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName and g.name = :groupName

named-query.name: findGroupMemberSelf
named-query.query: select distinct gm from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName and g.name is null

named-query.name: findGroupsAndMembersByLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct gm, g, u from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join fetch gm.group g inner join fetch gm.user u where exists ( select igm from UserGroupMemberEntity igm inner join igm.user iu where iu.loginName = :loginName and igm.group = gm.group ) and g.name is not null order by g.name, u.loginName

named-query.name: findMembersByGroupIdAndLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct gm, g, u from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join fetch gm.group g inner join fetch gm.user u where exists ( select igm from UserGroupMemberEntity igm inner join igm.user iu where iu.loginName = :loginName and igm.group = gm.group ) and g.id = :groupId and g.name is not null order by u.loginName

named-query.name: findAllTags
named-query.query: select distinct t from TagEntity t order by t.text

named-query.name: findTagByText
named-query.query: select distinct t from TagEntity t where t.text = :text

named-query.name: findCredentialById
named-query.query: select distinct c from CredentialEntity c inner join fetch c.privateKey inner join fetch c.owner left outer join fetch c.tags left outer join fetch c.certificates where c.id = :id

named-query.name: findAllCredentialsByLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct c from CredentialEntity c inner join fetch c.owner left outer join fetch c.tags t where exists ( select distinct g from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName and gm.group = c.owner ) order by c.name

named-query.name: findAllCredentialsByOwnerId
named-query.query: select distinct c from CredentialEntity c inner join c.owner g where g.id = :ownerId

named-query.name: findAllRequestsByLoginName
named-query.query: select distinct r from CredentialRequestEntity r inner join fetch r.owner left outer join fetch r.tags t where exists ( select distinct g from UserGroupMemberEntity gm inner join gm.group g inner join gm.user u where u.loginName = :loginName and gm.group = r.owner ) order by r.name
